input_email_body:
Subject: Systems Faced Data Breach Attempt

There was an attempt at a data breach on the systems. The issue might be due to outdated security software My name is Elena Ivanova.. Attempts to update McAfee and secure device access were unsuccessful. You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.
